task: SPECULATION – Defeat Echo Cerberus.
rewardDescription: Powerful boots combining all 3 Cerberus boots.

task: Kill an Ogress.
rewardDescription:
Select three combat skills. Whenever you gain XP in one of your chosen skills, gain 50% XP in the other two.

Available skills: Attack, Strength, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged, Magic, Prayer

task: Defeat Jal-Zek within the Inferno.
rewardDescription: Always be on-task for all slayer monsters and unlock all slayer task perks for free.

task: SPECULATION – Yama
rewardDescription:
When damage would reduce you to 0 hp, you become invulnerable and are healed based on the damage dealt over the next 16 ticks (9.6 seconds).
Your combat stats are instantly boosted to 255 but begin draining rapidly back down.

task:
Feather meets the claw,
Balance kept in humble wire,
Secrets sleep in steel.
rewardDescription: Damage dealt is increased by 0.4% for each hitpoint missing. The player is guaranteed to hit their max hit on an NPC with full health.

task:
Golden moon of milk,
Stored in banks since ages past,
Mice fear only lag.
rewardDescription: All special attacks cost 20% spec energy and have +100% accuracy.

task: Reach 500 total level.
rewardDescription: An experience lamp containing 25,000 XP to be used on any skill.

task: Cook a shark while weaing a chef's hat.
rewardDescription:
A shark that isn't consumed when eaten.
Heals a base of 20 hitpoints.

task: Complete the Inferno in 30 minutes or less.
rewardDescription: Summon a powerful thrall lasting for 30 minutes. The guardian will attack your target with whatever style it is weak to and will AoE attack in multi-combat.

task: Obtain some valuables from a house in Varlamore.
rewardDescription:
• High and Low Level Alchemy spells have no rune cost or level requirements.
• Items give 15% more gold and have a 65% chance to not be consumed when the spell is cast.
• 20K coins can be offered at Prayer altars in exchange for Prayer XP equivalent to using a dragon bone.

task:
Boiling iron breath,
Forge-fire warms the drinker's soul,
Courage in each gulp.
Chop maple logs – 45 woodcutting.
rewardDescription:
A choice from one of the following:
• Power Miner
• Lumberjack
• Animal Wrangler

task:
Buried in brown earth,
Simple strength for weary hands,
A meal, hard-earned, warm.
rewardDescription: Auto-complete all questlines unlocking access to the Tirannwn region, including the elf city of Prifddinas.
Increase XP gain by 200% for all skills.

task: Gain over 30,000 coins from one alchemy spell.
rewardDescription: All items are processed at once when doing specific skilling activities, with a chance to make an extra product. Artisan skills also receive a +12 boost.

task:
Not potion, nor spell,
Still the hand that sips finds peace,
Warmth cloaks mortal will.
rewardDescription:
• Pickpocket all NPCs in an 11x11 square.
• 100% success rate on all Thieving checks.
• Auto re-pickpocket until you can no longer do so.
• Items obtained from pickpocketing are noted.
• Maximum coin pouch count increased by 3x.

task: SPECULATION – Win a Gnomeball match.
rewardDescription: Receive a pair of Sage's greaves. While equipped, the Sage's greaves grant Agility experience based on your Agility level while you run.

task: Complete the Grid Master tutorial.
rewardDescription:
A choice from one of the following:
• Power Miner
• Lumberjack
• Animal Wrangler

task: Complete level 4 of the Stronghold of Security.
rewardDescription: Receive a fairy mushroom which allows teleporting to any fairy ring, spirit tree, or tool leprechaun.

task:
Golden feather falls,
Guiding knights through mist and myth,
Faith finds what is lost.
rewardDescription: When gathering resources, find and store random grimy herbs, while also providing a small amount of Herblore experience when one is found.

task:
Moonlight softly hums,
Silver wings kiss midnight air,
Dreams take flight unseen.
Subdue Tempoross – 35 fishing.
rewardDescription:
Select three artisan skills. When you gain experience in one of your three selected skills you'll gain 50% of that experience in the other two skills.

Available skills: Construction, Cooking, Crafting, Firemaking, Fletching, Herblore, Runecraft, Smithing

task: Mine gold ore – 40 mining.
rewardDescription:
A choice from one of the following:
• Power Miner
• Lumberjack
• Animal Wrangler

task: Witness the Gemstone Crab burrow away.
rewardDescription:
Select three gathering or support skills. When you gain experience in one of your three selected skills you'll gain 50% of that experience in the other two skills.

Available skills: Mining, Fishing, Woodcutting, Hunter, Agility, Slayer, Thieving
Identical stats to Barrows gloves combined with the effect of Amulet of the Damned.

task: Defeat all 4 Awakened bosses.
rewardDescription: A tribrid helmet with no negative bonuses, that also functions as a slayer helm.

task: SPECULATION – Receive a unique drop from a boss in the God Wars Dungeon.
rewardDescription: Stores the player's current tile coordinates, hp, prayer, and spec energy. Any time later, the player may use the crystal to teleport back to the stored coordinates while restoring their stats to the stored values.

task: Open Bryophyta's chest.
rewardDescription: +1 to all combat masteries.

task: SPECULATION – Jim's wet cloth
Obtain a rare unique from Tombs of Amascut.
rewardDescription:
Choose one of the three mega rares from raids:
Scythe of Vitur, Tumeken's Shadow, Twisted Bow

task: Build a demonic throne in your player owned house.
rewardDescription: A powerful Khopesh, imbued with the power of thunder and lightning.

task: Deposit a skillcape into your player owned house.
rewardDescription: Acts like a permanent ring of recoil. Reflect 25% of the damage you receive.

task: Defeat the lesser demon in the Wizards' Tower.
rewardDescription: Your Melee, Ranged and Magic hits will never deal below 5 damage. You can still miss your attacks.

task:
Cracked upon the wall,
Shell of pride and yolk of fear,
Fall, respawn, repeat.

rewardDescription: A godsword combining the effects of all 5 godswords. Counts as a god item towards all factions in the God Wars Dungeon. Woof!
An offensive shield that provides immunity to all status effects – poison, venom, dragonfire, icy breath, swamp decay, desert heat, and chill stat-drains.
Increase XP gain by 200% for all skills.
A weapon from a being that truly worships gods. Gains a sunlight stack every attack, up to a max of 20, that can be unleashed for powerful AoE damage.
